issue.title: [R] Update R macOS/Windows builds for change in cmake compression defaults
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6831](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6831). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-6631 changed the defaults for including compressions but did not update these build scripts.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6831?focusedCommentId=16948910) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5612
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5612>
